text: Koilodepas ferrugineum is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Epiprineae Category:Endemic flora of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Trees of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Koilodepas ferrugineum
